attributes.action: Make Jayne Torvill & Christopher Dean Dame & Sir
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Torvill & Dean are British sporting legends who are not only former British, European, World & Olympic Ice Skating Champions, they remain the only people in Olympic history to recieve a perfect score from the judging panel for their inspiring freestyle dance "Bolero". They inspire millions of people the world over and are a true credit to this country. They deserve the knight/damehood for services to sport and being exceptional role models to today's youth 26 years after they made history.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
